excerpt.rendered:
Blossom Facial Dream Cream

An ethereal symphony of lemon peel, ylang ylang, frangipani and jasmine blossom oils that is bursting with anti-aging, anti-oxidant and skin-enriching benefits. Feel your spirit soar as this divine nourishing elixir transports you to a soothing, skin-smooth nirvana.

You can buy this product here: Shopalila
